website_summaries.verdict: Huge surface area means less time spent scrubbing.
pros: Built with durability in mind with thick stainless steel bristles
The 18" handle helps keep your hands away from the heat
Safe for all kinds of grates
cons: Some users note that it could benefit from a scraper

customer_reviews.title: Wife bought one for Christmas 2015 and showing the results ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife bought one for Christmas 2015 and showing the results nearly 2 years later. Just ordered a new one and got it today and thought I'd share how well it holds up. We figure we use our Weber ... on average, 3 days a week. So, with that ... under 2 years we've used this ~150 times. Including photos and proof of this purchase. We use it on a cast iron grill also and never seen anything work as well as this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Waiyne

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic brush. A must for your grill!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to go with my new replacement grill just in time for grilling season. Based on the price I fully expected this grill brush would be in the trash bin in no time but I needed something to get me started. For the price I would have expect that, but this brush has been so much better. I have paid lots more for much lesser brushes. As the directions state keep the brush wet for best results. This is a recommended purchase. Grab one and get grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Dinks_no_more

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this grill brush. I have only used it a couple times, but it does a really nice job of getting between the rails on the grill. I did as suggested and used a Tupperware container and dipped the brush into it before using it. Not only does it help keep the brush much cleaner, but also it quite a bit more effective at cleaning. I highly recommend this brush for a great way to clean your grill.
customer_reviews.author: BKrause

customer_reviews.title: You need one...or two
customer_reviews.text: This thing is freaking amazing! I know, it's just a grill brush, but I'm so tired of grill brushes that suck or start to suck after a few uses. This thing cleans my charcoal grill with stuff crusted on it & keeps my new gas grill pristine. Wet or dry, seriously the best grill brush I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Skinny

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous brush - loosing bristles after limited use
customer_reviews.text: Loved the brush at first - great design, but poor quality. I used it on a small portable Coleman grill with cast iron grates between 15 and 20 times over the past year and a half and it started shedding bristles. I found out when my 10 year old daughter pulled one out of her mouth during dinner. I checked the grill and there were hundreds in the catch pan. The brush stayed with the grill in the garage when not in use so it was never left outside. I'm surprised nobody s circling around on their 5 star reviews to report this. It can't just be me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buyer! Great brush, lasts 2 years with frequent use.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this Alpha Grillers brush. The first lasted around 2 years with frequent use on a Weber 22" charcoal grill. Lots of sticky, crusty messes cleaned up, from ribs to wings and everything in between, and the grill grates look terrific. I've owned several other brands and styles of grill brushes over the years, but this one is the best combination of price, function, design and quality. Follow the recommendation to use a little water and clean the brush afterwards - I didn't with the first one, and was still pleased I got two years out of it. Most others barely last a summer!
customer_reviews.author: VA2NC

customer_reviews.title: Great grill brush!
customer_reviews.text: After using nearly daily for over 2-weeks I think this is the best grill brush that I've owned. One big difference in the way that I used this brush and others is the recommendation to dip the brush in water as you're cleaning the grill. I don't know what I never tried that before, but it's a serious game changer. That said, this brush is great for the price. It features a nice long handle so you can stay (mostly) away from the heat. The brush head is wide and lets you easily get in between the grates. Overall - I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: New and improved. When only the best will do!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second alpha griller's grill brush. When I bought my original product about two years ago I thought I had purchased the ultimate brush for cleaning my Weber gas grill cast-iron grates. But I was wrong! This new "Triple" grill brush is superior. Not only is the construction on par with my previous purchase, but the design of this new and improved grill brush is beyond outstanding! Somebody really thought this through. This clever design really is a quantum leap in grill cleaning. The emphasis is on cleaning not only the surface but deep down the sides of each grate. This makes the yearly maintenance and cleaning of your grill so much easier. Well done alpha!
customer_reviews.author: Breakerm

customer_reviews.title: Looks strange but works fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Very unique design, and appears very well made. Prior to purchasing this product, all I've ever used was the typical Wal-Mart plastic handled deal with the little 2x3" brush molded in. If you've had them, you know how poorly they work. Alpha Grillers brush is a whole different product. Every time I clean grill, it looks like new again. Unique design actually does clean top and sides of grate. Use it wet on a hot grill for the best cleaning. Love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Z. (ZacMan)

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush!
customer_reviews.text: My husband says this mighty brush is overkill for our little grill, but I was tired of the complaints about the small cheap rusty brushes he was using. Very well made and super sturdy. Looks like it will last forever. Handle is long, which is great for big grills. Looks like someone who BBQs a lot sat down and thought out the perfect grill brush. update April 2017: bristles are rustproof, but the twisted wire holding them rusted. wire is very sturdy though, so we'll see how long before it rusts into uselessness.
customer_reviews.author: mizsydney

customer_reviews.title: Best Grill Brush Ever Made
customer_reviews.text: I almost NEVER give 5-stars, but I will for this. I’ve been grilling for 45 years and I can honestly say that this brush is the best I’ve ever used. I’ve been using Weber gas for at least 15 years, and this does a great job cleaning those heavy grates; use it as soon as you take the food off - the hotter the better. You’ll love it. I have one for home and a second for camping. As long as I’m doing the grilling, I’ll never use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy J Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great design for cleaning. and really sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after my fairly expensive grill brush with a wooden handle weathered and split apart. I grill year round and live where there is lots of rain. My grill tools are outside within reach and up where the dog cannot lick them. I am happy this brush is heavy gage metal and plastic so it won't split on me . It is larger and more sturdy than I was expecting and the brush design being parallel to the grill grates cleans more effectively. Nothing like it in my local market. I'm glad I found it here.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen L. Schatzel

customer_reviews.title: Really sturdy grill brush!
customer_reviews.text: Great grill brush: solid construction means it's heavier than a lot of ones I've found at discount stores. It doesn't feel plastic-y at all. The handle is comfortable, making it easy to apply pressure and get stubborn residue off the grill. The three parallel brushes help you clean the grate twice as fast, and there's a metal edge for scraping big obstructions. Not pictured, at the end of the handle is a metal loop so it's easy to hang on the grill for storage. The instructions provide a great tip: wet the brush before use to help steam off grease and clean the brush easier. Very happy I bought this brush and I'm excited to use it all summer long.
customer_reviews.author: MKB from CT

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: It actually works! We have tried lots of other brushes and tricks for getting the grill clean, but nothing seemed to cut through the crud like this one. It was easy to use and the three brushes are designed perfectly to get in all the nooks and crannies of the grates. I also liked that I didn't have to work very hard. Sometimes you will have brushes that you really have to bare down on to get any kind of result. This one took minimal pressure and I didn't feel like I had just done a full day of arm day at the gym when I was done. Overall, we are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Manders511

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning Power!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how much better this works than my old scraper from a big box retailer. The handle is very sturdy but the scrapers have enough lateral flex to get between the thick bars of my porcelain Vermont Castings grates. I've been using this every few days for 3 months and haven't seen a single bristle come off. I think my grates are now the cleanest they've ever been! I bought a second one for my dad!
customer_reviews.author: kev994

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design - and it comes with excellent advice on how to clean a grille - - EFFECTIVELY!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Not that they actually "need" any more 5-Star Reviews - but you can DOUBLE this one. I just bought a second one for my other grille. They're THAT good!! Best brush I've experienced. Follow their instructions about cleaning your grill while it's HOT - - and with a WET brush - - and you will keep your grill "like new" - - other than the discoloration that comes with anything "chrome" being in close proximity to burning charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: Peter W.

customer_reviews.title: Great grill brush
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy, cleans multiple grill grate styles easily. Also has a design that lets you get slightly below the grates to get to the dripped on leavings. Unfortunately, one of our grill makers abandoned the round bars and went to flat style plates, which collect a ton more grease and grime, but this tool will get most of that out for you as well. Unlike other brushes we have used, this one stands up to heavy use without deforming or falling apart. If you grill, you need this brush
customer_reviews.author: Been there, tried that

customer_reviews.title: Great Grillbrush
customer_reviews.text: Perfect grill brush to clean the grates on my weber gas grill. You can really put some force on it if required to get those hard to remove areas. But overall I just heat the grill up and a few good swipes and the grill is ready to go. Very sturdy well made and the leather hang loop work well to store it right on the grill. Best brush I have found so far.
customer_reviews.author: MTC

customer_reviews.title: This is THE grill brush to buy
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this grill brush. Why do so many other grill brushes have a big square head of bristles? Or bristles aligned in the wrong direction. I don't know why it never occurred to me that if the bristles fit between the grates, and ran vertically as my grates do, that I would more effectively clean my grill. I feel like I've wasted years of my life using poorly designed grill brushes. This works perfectly on my Weber grill with cast iron grates. Seriously, if you need a grill brush, get this one, you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: A clean grill once again.
customer_reviews.text: My grill is 10 yrs. old with cast iron grates. It gets used almost daily spring through fall and at least once a week during winter. I was ready to toss the grates and buy new ones. Then I saw this grill brush and decided to try this first. This brush did an amazing job of cleaning my grill grates; they look almost new. Follow the instructions that come with the brush and your grill will be clean in no time.
customer_reviews.author: LakeLadyNH

customer_reviews.title: Best grill brush that I've found.
customer_reviews.text: Best grill brush I've found. Bristles are stainless but the other metal parts rust. Cleans up well in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Burwen

customer_reviews.title: Great grill brush
customer_reviews.text: The product was well packaged and it gave the impression of a very high quality product. The grill brush did not disappoint - it truly is a high quality brush and has be look\ feel of something very durable. The grill brush is extremely easy to use and the instructions were very easy to understand. I can honestly say that there isn't anything that I disliked about the brush and I will absolutely purchase this product again whenever it needs to be replaced..
customer_reviews.author: Margaret R. Foltz

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I got my first charcoal grill ever and based on the reviews here, I purchased this particular brush. First looks: well packaged. Proper protection for the bristles. small manual that provides instructions on how to use the brush properly as well as how to take care of it. Actual use: scrubs really quickly and easily removes the residue. Cleans really easily as well. I would be recommending this to anyone else who might be looking for a brush in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vayakornvichit

customer_reviews.title: OK but doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: My first one lasted about two years with occasional use. I just bought a replacement that doesn’t have the company logo on the handle so I have to wonder if it’s a knock-off... The “stainless steel” brush mounts of the replacement are smaller than the original, and the handle appears to be cheaper construction. I’ll try it out this weekend to see how it does. It does not come with a “Lifetime Bulletproof Guarantee” promoted on the product page and in the packaging. Their web site notes just a year for returns and refunds.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Glass

customer_reviews.title: Best Grill Brush!
customer_reviews.text: After 3 years of superior grill cleaning, I needed to buy another one of these grill brushes. These grill brushes last so much longer and do a better job then the ones you can find at Lowes! I grill dinner at least a couple of nights each week. This grill brush is the best! I do follow their recommendation of cleaning the grill immediately after use and when the grill is warm and using warm water on the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans between
customer_reviews.text: Brush grill cleans grill easily! Bought this brush grill to replace another one we had just purchased that did not work at all. This one definitely does the job! Easy to use and gets our grill ready, clean for grilling food. The three sprongs get between the grill grooves and cleans deep into the grill plates to remove glued on food for a cleaner grill. Love it! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysReading

customer_reviews.title: Solid grill brush!!! Buy now!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tired of other dumpy grill brushes that feel flimsy, cheap, and couldn't scrape hot butter off of a plate, let alone get your grates clean? Look no further, just buy this one. It is solid, sturdy, and works great. This is my second one. I had my first for quite a few years, and it was just time for a new one. I didn't replace it because it broke or was a defect. I doubt I will ever own another type or brand of grill brush again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy to use grill brush
customer_reviews.text: Great grill brush. This is easy to use. The long, angled handle gives additional leverage where you need it while protecting your hand. The triple set of bristles give added cleaning power without fear of them coming loose while cleaning and creating a possible danger. The instructions that come with the brush and the follow up email from the seller make using this a breeze. I am not going to have a dirty grill in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S

customer_reviews.title: Best brush for cleaning the grill!!
customer_reviews.text: This brush rocks, works even better with a bucket of water and a hot grill. Amazed by how this brush cleans so great and doesn't get full of crap!! Hasn't rust yet like a few people have mention and I have used it about 10 times now. I already had 3 other friends purchase them, definitely a must for any kind of grill!!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: A great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I honestly did not expect it to be as big as it was when I ordered it, so that was a very pleasant surprise. Where it used to take me a long time to clean my grill takes me now mere minutes. Very easy to use. Instructions are not only about how to best get results while using it but also how to care for it after use, and they are very helpful! I can't think of anything I would want to improve on this brush. It seems like it's heavy-duty, doing what it is advertised, and doing a good job at that! Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: XS

customer_reviews.title: Works but must follow instructions dipping in  water often on  hot grill!
customer_reviews.text: Must make several passes, grill must be hot, left at max heat for 10 minutes so grease was loose. Use on weber grill cast iron grill. works better than previous brushes but not perfect. Ideally bristles would be cut and shaped somewhat triangular to meet grill design but imagine that would triple cost. I would recommend, but dip in water often while in use if you want grill to get clean. Have used about 4 times no lost bristles observed and still works like new.
customer_reviews.author: NeutronFlux

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Grillers!
customer_reviews.text: Love this.... cleans my stainless steel grill racks so well... just dip in water and scrub the grates while still warm... cleans up so easy! Afterward I let it sit in hot water and Dawn and the brush is like new again! No metal bristles flaking off or melting down... this brush is a workhorse! It’s angled so you can push it back and forth while cleaning. Best grill brush ever!
customer_reviews.author: joyce d.

customer_reviews.title: Best BBQ brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush is the best bbq brush I have ever bought. The unique design cleans the grill at every angle possible. I used it for the first time yesterday and my grill was cleaned with ease. They suggest to add water to brush which I did, what a great tip. The company includes perks that really make the customer feel appreciated. I will buy more products from this company. A+++++
customer_reviews.author: nandos

customer_reviews.title: Best grill brush ever
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a new grill brush, the old plastic one I was using broke from hard cleaning. This thing has a nice long handle so your hand isn't close to a hot grill and the three brush heads are spaced perfectly to fit between grates. The bristles are also long so you are able to really get between and deeply into the grates. Perfect grill brush
customer_reviews.author: A. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty & durable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several of these due to the price range. I am so glad I did. Upon arrival, my husband started eye balling them, so I gave him one to test. Usually, he is very cautious of wire cleaning brushes because he had some bad experiences, but this one held up to his tests. The others are for gifts, IF my husband doesn't steal them for himself.
customer_reviews.author: shoppingdiva

customer_reviews.title: My grill has never been cleaner
customer_reviews.text: If you follow the instructions, your grill will look brand new. I cleaned the side that I constantly use with this brush and it looked a million times better than the side I never use. The only thing I would caution people against is the ability for pieces of the brush to get into your food. Just be careful. But the sturdiness and effectiveness of this brush makes it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: GREAT purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this grill brush as a replacement to our older one which I wasn't sure what kind of bristles it had. I'm pretty pleased with it so far! The handle is long enough to clean the grill with full flames if need be, doesn't leave harmful bristles behind which are easily swallowed and not digested, and does a pretty decent job scrubbing all the residue off our grill. I'd definitely recommend it to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: JLynnRN88

customer_reviews.title: Great product, i have bought many different type they ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, i have bought many different type they either lasted couple weeks or they didn't do the job. This is a very high quality strong brush. You can apply as many pressure as you could but the handle will not bend. I recommend it to my friends and i definitely recommend to other buyers as well. It cleans really well!
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The Last Grill Brush you will ever need !
customer_reviews.text: I just received the AlphaGrillers Grill Brush and it is one of the best I've ever used. I love to cook and grill and have had many different brushes in the past. This one is built to take some abuse if you put some effort into cleaning your grill grates. Most of the plastic ones will bend or break but this one is made of metal except for the handle cover. If you need a sturdy brush to get the job done, this is the one !
customer_reviews.author: Mititei

customer_reviews.title: Best grill brush ever!
customer_reviews.text: This grill brush lives up to all the glowing reviews. Always a skeptic, I was prepared to find something wrong with a tool that had received so many accolades. How wrong I was! This brush has a unique design, not to mention a sturdy long handle, and it works exactly as described. Within a couple minutes, I cleaned the grill. For optimum results, follow the instructions. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Works like a bristly charm!
customer_reviews.text: So, I didn't clean my grill the way I should or as often as I could because my tools for cleaning were just awful. This brush is amazing! It is sharp, so be careful handling the bristles, but it cleans off grease and food crud just perfectly! It's quick, easy to use, and easy to clean afterwards. The three line design also means you're cleaning a nice large surface amount quickly, instead of scrubbing some small brush for much much longer. I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Webb

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This brush does an amazing job! The fact that the cleaning bristles are installed lengthwise makes it work so much easier since there is more surface area of the brush on the grill. Also, the narrower width allows you to get more even pressure on the cleaning surface. You know what I mean if you are like me and always wear out a part of the brush from the angle you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Hedin

customer_reviews.title: Also the bristles don't seem to be easily folded so they are working great
customer_reviews.text: Incredible brush. I won't be buying any other brand but this one. I have a infrared grill which has V shaped grates and the edges of this helps get in the V. Also the bristles don't seem to be easily folded so they are working great.
customer_reviews.author: E.Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS BRUSH LOOSING BRISTLES.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is dangerous, it looses it's bristles on the grill every time I use it and it is rusting out where the bristles are attached at the twisted wires. This brush was purchased in Novembre of 2018 and lost some bristles the first time I used it, a new brush could loose some bristles but it is still loosing some after 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Lise T.

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: Nothing about the brush to dislike. Just a couple of swipes and my grill was clean. It's now hanging on my Treager so I will remember to use it when the grill is still hot. It had cooled down quite a bit before I used it the first time and it still cleaned it up great. For me it worked well on both a hot and warm grill.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good grill brush
customer_reviews.text: This grill brush is great for cleaning the top of the grates as well as in between. I really love that it is very tough and I believe it will hold up for a long time. The only thing I would add is a scraper for really stuck on messes, but if you clean the grill while it is still hot after every meal you should not have any problems with keeping your grill clean.
customer_reviews.author: sammyg1125

customer_reviews.title: Best Steel Bristle BBQ Brush I've Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: Just put a new grill in and decided to get a new grill brush to keep it clean. Was a little cautious about the steel bristle kind but after reading the reviews, I wanted to give this one a try. Just used it for the first time tonight and it is the best steel bristly brush I've ever used. Look forward to keeping the grill clean with this great product.
customer_reviews.author: William Capodanno

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Barbecue Tool!
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaning tool for my Weber grill...fast, efficient, and does a great job. Also, it is priced very reasonably and shipped fast. Could not be more pleased!👍
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth H. Helman

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and effective at cleaning my grill
customer_reviews.text: This grill brush is pretty heavy duty. I have a large grill, so I like that it comes with a good sized handle, so I can effectively reach the back of my grill for cleaning. As long as you follow the directions exactly, this brush does an excellent job of cleaning my grates and it does not shed any of the metal fibers. I was particularly worried about that. It's a great grill brush that seems like it will ;last a really long time.
customer_reviews.author: jme1426

customer_reviews.title: I do a lot of research before buying ANYTHING.
customer_reviews.text: Do I "like" it? Honestly, NO! I love this brush. Makes grill cleaning easy, and fast. I plan on purchasing more to give to grilling friends. I ONLY do this IF I'm impressed with a product. I'm a Master Auto Tech, for 35 years. I know a quality tool, and the value of one. Hopefully my friends don't read this, as it wouldn't be a surprise. I have used many a grill brush over the years. And this one is, by far, The BEST! Time will tell as to longevity. So far, not one doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Casey    S.W. Florida

customer_reviews.title: BEST GRILL BRUSH I'VE OWNED IN 40 YEARS!
customer_reviews.text: I am finally replacing the brush I bought in January 2016!! I could still use it until it's a full 4 YEARS OLD, but why not get a new one since they're $10? I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS GRILL BRUSH!! We grill at least 3 times a week. Remember to rinse it after every use and don't crush it to oblivion and it'll last you just as long.
customer_reviews.author: Tron buyer

customer_reviews.title: Best I've found yet
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic brush. Stiff bristles, nice length, super sturdy, and simple design made cleaning easy. Loved the fact that the bristles were able to clean 180 degrees instead of just getting the top 45 degrees of the grates. Was able to finally get a good scrubbing on the sides of the rails as well. Stiff bristles pulled off tons of gunk and got me back to shiny metal again. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace another I had. It’s large and heavy but I found that I don’t like the bristle type grill cleaners. They always flatten or break off. Although this one is good, I’m not sure it will last as long as other non type bristle ones do. Time will tell. Overall it’s large to clean the area quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dronebarger

customer_reviews.title: A grill brush that makes cleaning easier
customer_reviews.text: This brush’s bristle design allows me to slip through the grills bars while cleaning, effectively getting more stuff off in just a few swipes. Also, I dig the tip on placing the brush in water prior to using the brush. This really helps steam off and scrub the small stuff a brush simply won’t get to.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego woman

customer_reviews.title: -This is the best grill brush ever!
customer_reviews.text: This grill brush is the best I've ever used. No bristles fall out of it. I'm on my second one and the first one I owned, I owned for over a year. The bristles never fell out. I lost it when we accidentally left it out with our old grill to go to the scrapyard. So disappointed but delighted that I could get another one just like it!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grill brush
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best grill brush I have owned. The quality is excellent and the design makes cleaning the grill much easier than brushes I have used in the past. I use a large cup of water to dip the brush and apply wet to the hot grill. This allows the steam to clean the grill better than most degreasers. The design of this brush allows for easy dipping into the water. I have been using this now for month with no noticeable wear.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Hartsfield

customer_reviews.title: Handle Broke
customer_reviews.text: Great design, heavy duty and angles well to get a good scrub on heavy residue. The bristles are sharp so keep away from animals and kids. Disappointed though because after two years, the handle snapped in half so now it’s trash. I guess for the price, two years is as much as I can expect.
customer_reviews.author: ntaylor

customer_reviews.title: Great grill brush for the price
customer_reviews.text: I think the brush being bristle free and so heavy duty is the best quality of this brush. The handle will not break like I had on other brushes when trying to clean really stuck on messes. The brush is so well made. Product is very easy to use and is very good quality. I would recommend it to anyone looking to have a good grill brush
customer_reviews.author: A.Newman

customer_reviews.title: Great brush!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice high quality grill cleaning brush, it is built study and appears that it will hold up for years,without worrying about breaking it .. I love the length of the handle and the three rows of bristles help clean nicely. I was able to clean up the grill with this brush and a little water (recommended) pretty quickly. I think I may have to purchase another one of these for my brother-in-laws upcoming birthday. Great brush!
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Atwood

customer_reviews.title: Wow...Quick Cleaning Brush.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the old standard grill "scrubber" from a box store. It's always taken at least a couple minutes to scrub away the grate. Using this brush, I basically wiped the brush across the grill and it took away virtually all grime. Lovin this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Toomey

customer_reviews.title: So far so Good, not perfect but works
customer_reviews.text: Brush is pretty good, if I could change one this it would be the brushes were a little farther apart so they fit between grill slates better, I bent mine a little to improve contact. Otherwise its exactly as expected, I grill daily at my house and kill a brush monthly, if this one last a month I'll be happy, so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Toddfather

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this grill brush!”
customer_reviews.text: This brush is excellent. It cleans the crevices so much better and easier than the grill brushes I have used in the past. The quality is comparable to premium brands I have purchased in the past. It seems durable and well made. If you are looking for a great brush, look no further, buy now! I would highly recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Terrible waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I use water on an extremely hot grill just like you're supposed to, and everything steams up. I work with every bit of my might to clean that grill and it looks horrible when I'm done, other than the very front of each grill bar. This was certainly money right down the drain and I would never purchase again. Avoid! Avoid !!! Avoid !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vince Perri

customer_reviews.title: Powerful grill cleaning brush
customer_reviews.text: Just moved into a new house which means we bought a new grill. This brush works great on cleaning my new grill. I get a bowl of soapy water to soak this brush in and heat my grill up. Once my grill is nice a toasty, this brush works wonders on cutting through all the caked on debris. I will update this review in a few weeks if the brush starts to have issues. Great price and awesome job a scrapping all the crud off.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Other uses for this brush
customer_reviews.text: I have had this brush for 3 years now. I have used this on my gas as well as charcoal grills with excellent results. Today I found a new use. I used the brush to clean the grill work on my security doors for painting. Worked great! Now have to get another for use on the grills.
customer_reviews.author: bravogolf

customer_reviews.title: Finally makes it easy to clean my grill
customer_reviews.text: Have gone thru numerous grill brushes - when I got this I liked it enough I ordered a 2nd for my kids. I've been using it consistently for almost a year - usually 2-3 times a week (is a smaller grill tho). Bristles are still strong and continues to work well, while most ones I've used aren't stiff enough to begin with, and break down faster. Makes it easy to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H

customer_reviews.title: Great grill brush, but.
customer_reviews.text: Use on my Weber stainless grill grates. Spray with a little water and brush when grill is still hot. This is my second one, first one lasted about a year and the arms that hold the bristles loosened up (reason for 4 stars) and made brush unusable. Hope new one goes farther.
customer_reviews.author: Albert D.

customer_reviews.title: Great grill brush
customer_reviews.text: This grill brush fits between the rows of the grill easily but still snuggly to provide a full cleaning of the grill. The long handle allows you to clean without having to get too close to the grill so you avoid getting your hands or clothing near the greasy grill. It’s a great product at a reasonable price and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bones

customer_reviews.title: Build quality, design is poor
customer_reviews.text: The issue with this brush is its very sub par build quality. Only the second time using it, and the handle broke off while cleaning grill grates. The point where the base of the metal bristles and plastic handle come together is a simple force fit design, maybe with a drop or two of glue. This type of design will fail every time, just a matter of when. Recommend looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: xray

customer_reviews.title: Best grill brush
customer_reviews.text: This is what I have been looking for. It really gets the stuff off the grill and has held up to use. We grill at least 4 days a week. Other grill brushes do not get the whole grate clean. This one does. And it does not disintegrate in less than 6 months. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Christopher Shumans

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy: Very Sturdy, Well-made, & Cleans My Grill Faster Than Other Brushes That I Have Tried
customer_reviews.text: Our family grills regularly and I have used a fair number of grill brushes, lots of shapes and styles. I can honestly say that this is by far the best grill brush I have ever used. The combination of the long handle, sturdy construction, and triple-brush style are just right in my opinion. My last brush does not even compare to this one. I would spend several minutes after I fire up the grill scrubbing the grates to clean off the cooked-on residues from the previous grilling session. This brush cuts that cleaning time down to a 1/4th of what I used to spend. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: This brush is the best I've used!
customer_reviews.text: That's right people we are talking grill brushes here! Pretty exciting stuff right... I know it isn't but hey when a product works and works great you gotta spread the word. So if your looking for a grill brush that will make your day and get the job done look no further you have hit the jackpot!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Leabow

customer_reviews.title: strong, practial and efficient
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had been looking for a new grill brush for some time, because ours was some years old and started to look quite inefficient. We found this from one, from Alpha Grillers, and it is just a perfect grill brush! It was inexpensive, it has 3 strong, stiff, steel brushes that are doing a good job in keeping the grill clean, and we also like the strong, sturdy grip of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Young

customer_reviews.title: Standard Brush
customer_reviews.text: Marketing aside, it performs as any grill brush should. Id just advise not spending extra or replacing an existing one as long as it works. At the end of the day, a grill brush is a grill brush. Plus the residue from the grill gets caught in the brushes after cleaning so you have to have a place where you can brush it off, or just smack it against a side of concrete to get it to fall out.
customer_reviews.author: DJP

customer_reviews.title: The item works great for cleaning the grill
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brush I have used it on my grill plenty of times and it’s still like new. It’s really able to get all the grease off and all the black charcoal or left over food off the grill. This is the brush your looking for that’s gonna last you a long time.
customer_reviews.author: De La Fox Checks

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this thing! We were due for a new one and I got the opportunity to test this one out! It's plenty sturdy and scrubbed a grill that was a bit on the dirty side! It would be nice if it came with a scraper attachment for things like stuck on cheese (still got it off just needed some extra elbow grease) will definitely be recommending this!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla R. Linkert

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush Ever
customer_reviews.text: This brush really makes cleaning my Weber gas grill easy. Once the grill is heated, all the cooked on stuff can be quickly removed. Faster than a regular brush. Especially between the bars. The handle is kind of short so you want to wear a mit. I will get another one for my charcoal BBQ. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Grill Brush for sure!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best Bbq Grill brush I've ever used. Seriously, it is because it had a wide cleaning spread and it's heavy duty. I think it will last for quite awhile . I for sure will update the review if it doesn't but, don't think you'll hear bad things from me. I reccomend it for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great grill cleaner. Fits perfect between grates and it’s really heavy duty. High quality with a nice logo/packaging. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: It is rare that I get so excited by a purchase such as this. I have used it for several weeks now and it does the job like no other. I like everything about it and the seller. Knowing the dangers of using a non stainless brush, I wanted a brush that would not shed its "bristles" and end up in my food and my body. This thing is so well constructed of first rate material that I feel that it will not shed nor fall apart. I liked it so much, I just ordered another one for my Grillin Son.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves the brush
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush for my husband who’s the griller in our house and he was so excited! I guess i need to buy him more gifts haha! Anyway, the brush is awesome. It was very helpful that they recommended wetting the brush. It helped clean the grill even better. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: RetailTherapist

customer_reviews.title: Works as described. This is my second purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grill brush I've ever used. Been grilling for 30 years, My only issue is the handle is too short.
customer_reviews.author: Sagacity

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for grill.
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged and comes with a plastic cover for the bristles too. I got this for my husband who owns a KJ, and is always grilling. The brush did a great job cleaning, but would prefer a softer handle for when pushing down to clean as I have weak wrists. Overall great for the price, and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Zeli

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Quality Brush
customer_reviews.text: Just used the brush for the first time today and my grill hasn’t been cleaner since the day I got it. I followed all the tips provided when you purchase, which are pretty obvious but sometimes forgettable. No bristles were left behind and the grill is ready to go again. No complaints, will buy again if I need another.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Happy for choosing this product
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has a Big Green Egg BBQ and I bought this for him for his birthday. He loves it, as it does the job well. Great value for money - I was amazed at how good it was for the price. I recommended this product to my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Elwood Mendenhall

customer_reviews.title: This product is great, it is very good build quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, it is very good build quality, My grill was pretty bad and hasn't been cleaned in awhile, this brush took the burnt on grime right off and left and left my grill looking brand new, and even clean up of the brush was a breeze just rinsed it off under hot water and it was good as new untill next time i needed to use it. It earned all of the 5 stars i gave it and would definitely recommend this brush.
customer_reviews.author: jrmhknz1981

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: Very effective grill cleaner. Could use a scraper though. Hint: keep a small bucket of water on hand and dip the brush in the water before cleaning your still hot grill. Do this a couple of times, and the results are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Cold Cut Vic

customer_reviews.title: The greatest grill brush I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a licking and keeps on ticking! Over the years, I've had too many grill brushes that end up falling apart, not long after the first use. This one just keeps going. I'm not afraid to put alot of pressure down on it, and I'm not a small guy, by any stretch. Buy with confidence, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: average joe

customer_reviews.title: For a cleaner grill, choose this brush.
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me you go to start grilling and realize that you didn't clean your grill after your last use. So youve got a little extra crusties and you need to bake the grate for a while. A regular brush is great for cleaning the top, but this brush gets everything! Every. Thing. Now, because of this brush, my endeavors in cleaning my grill have never been easier. It is especially good a blasting away the build-up at the grate line intersections. Great brush.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Decent at first, then fall apart after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: Have bought 3 of these, they last 3-4 months at most using them 1-2X per week. Show they have a lifetime warranty, but went to return and my return window on Amazon was closed. Bought 11-27-19, return window closed 1-31-20. Good brush for the first few uses, then the bristles come off—happened on all 3 that I have bought. Would like the free replacement that the company states they offer.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Gleans my grill perfectly, Not good for exfoliating your skin though.
customer_reviews.text: this cleaned my grill and also my smoker grates just perfectly. The emailed instructions were perfect. But on a sad note, this did not exfoliating my skin and caused a rather bad prickly sensation. Like Road rash. Def would not use it to wash my back again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pace

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill Brush
customer_reviews.text: This grill brush really does the job. It's heavy duty and has tons of cleaning bristles. My grill looks great after using it. The brush comes with clear instructions and even explains how best to clean the brush. The only thing I don't love is that it has a plastic handle; I would have expected metal or silicone for use around hot surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline W

customer_reviews.title: Steady Decline
customer_reviews.text: This tool worked great right out of the box, but I have noticed a steady decline in it's effectiveness. My grill grates seem to be magnets for an unbelievable amount of grime and this tool has really struggled to get rid of it. Since I am not particularly obsessed with mixing the char of one item into the next thing grilled, its ok but definitely not the "Best bbq cleaner"
customer_reviews.author: Bauers35

customer_reviews.title: Average Grill Brush
customer_reviews.text: I was really expecting this to be an amazing grill brush based on the reviews. However it is a basic grill brush that works about the same as any grill brush I have ever owned. It’s not better but it’s not worse. For $7.50 on a lightning deal I guess I can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant on the triple brush concept however after using for a while I am a BIG fan of this brush. These work very well on my cast iron Weber grates - they clean the grates and do not simply get clogged like other brushes. The handle is solid and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cooke

customer_reviews.title: became bald in a short period of time
customer_reviews.text: became bald in a short period of time. the most important things is that the small sticks were found inside a meat a few time which is very dangerous (high chance of swallowing it).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Grill Brush I have Found
customer_reviews.text: We do wear these out, but we use it a lot. We cover the grill from Thanksgiving to St. Patricks Day. Otherwise, we use the grill every day it is not raining. We have tried other brushes, but we keep coming back to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory P. Alford

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw causes handle to break off.
customer_reviews.text: This brush isn't built well and has a design flaw that causes the handle to break away from the wires holding the brush. The wires are only molded into the handle < 1" deep and this isn't adequate for the amount of force you use to brush the debris off of your grill. Mine broke within 2 months. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Mr and Mrs E

customer_reviews.title: Hassle Free
customer_reviews.text: This grill brush has made me realize that I don’t have to worry anymore if I will host a Grill Party in our house. Aftercare is now hassle-free with the help of this brush. It will keep my griller last long and the dust from the coals will be gone and cleaned up in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Risley

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: The product was very sturdy and you can tell it’s very well made. I like the length of the handles as well- not too long, not too short. Its exactly what we would use for at home or at a park grill. We used it per instructions at a park grill by adding water to create steam and it cleaned super well! The instruction was super helpful and a useful guide on how to use it to its max. Its a really strong sturdy grill cleaner. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hong

product_meta.title: Alpha Grillers 18" Grill Brush. Best BBQ Cleaner. Safe for All Grills. Durable & Effective. Stainless Steel Wire Bristles and Stiff Handle. A for Barbecue Lovers.
feature_bullets: ✅THE GRILL BRUSH FOR PIT MASTERS. This BBQ Cleaner is your ultimate weapon against dirty grates, bad tasting meat and unhealthy barbecue. Our heavy duty design lets you use as much elbow grease as you want without any worry it’ll bend or break.

✅SAFE FOR PORCELAIN (AND ALL OTHER) GRATES. You want a brush that’ll get your grill looking good as new, but don’t want to risk damaging your expensive grates. The Alpha Grillers BBQ Brush has got your back! It will work perfectly on all grate types, including porcelain, stainless steel and cast iron.

✅EFFORTLESSLY CLEAN YOUR BBQ IN SECONDS. The days of slaving over a dirty grate while your friends enjoy the party are over. With 3x the surface area of a standard grill brush, packed full of rust proof stainless steel bristles, you’ll be done in a flash, leaving plenty of time to crack open a cold one and get back to the fun!

✅FULL CONTROL WITH NO BURNT HANDS. 18 inches long – the perfect length to keep yours hands well out the heat, while still giving you full control to scrub even those hard to reach areas. Whether your have a gas, charcoal, rotisserie or smoker, your barbeque will be looking brand new in no time.

✅LIFETIME 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. We are so confident you'll LOVE your brush, we will refund you all your money if you are not completely satisfied. You won’t get this kind of service with the big brands like Weber, Char Broil and Big Green Egg!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,138 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
